article.title: BACN Contract Extended
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman, San Diego, California, is being awarded a $34,226,968 cost-plus-fixed-fee modification to the Battlefield Airborne Communications Node (BACN) contract for a four-month extension for the continued operations support and maintenance of two BACN BD-700/E-11A platforms, and operational support and maintenance of the BACN payloads.Â Electronic Systems Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
